goTos.formLanding: Go to Microsoft Forms landing page

suggestions: Check that you have copied and pasted the full link correctly.
If you know the file owner, ask them if the file was included in the migration.

duplicatesFound.title: Duplicate files found
duplicatesFound.message: There are multiple files with the same name. Please check the links below to find the correct file.

formFound.title: Google Form detected
formFound.message: The migration from Google to Microsoft did not include forms.

errors.invalidLink: Enter a valid Google Drive link.
